p: Several meta-analysis studies have evaluated diabetes as a risk factor for PD. For example, a recent association study, including a total of 7 population-based cohort studies, further suggests that diabetes is associated with a 38% increase in PD risk [ 40]. This meta-analysis is consistent with previous studies [ 38, 41, 42]. Intriguingly, some reports found no association between diabetes and PD [ 43â€“47].
